description: Det Fælles Bedste is an umbrella organization located in a small town, focused on uniting various green initiatives in Denmark. Its primary goals include promoting sustainability in transportation and food systems. The organization operates with a small team, including the founder and his wife, alongside board members and collaborating NGOs. They emphasize collaboration and fairness, aiming to democratize scientific knowledge and engage marginalized voices. The initiative also hosts events to foster networking and awareness, while working closely with researchers and local stakeholders to influence policy and drive sustainable practices.
name: Det Fælles Bedste
